Virgo Framework Quickstart

Building a Simple Page

Create App

                    
# terminal

py virgo.py lightstart home

Create Route

                    
# apps/home/routes.py

from virgo.core.routing import routes
from virgo.core.response import Response, redirect
from virgo.core.template import render


def home_app(request):
    return render("home_app.html", app="home")
routes["/"] = home_app

Create Template

                    
<!-- home/templates/home_app.html -->
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>Document</title>
</head>
    <body>
        <h1>This is my Home Page</h1>         
    </body>
</html>

Import Route

Import your app's routes in virgo.py

                    
# virgo.py

import apps.home.routes

Run the Development Server

                    
# terminal

py virgo.py lightserve
